name: Oguri Cap (umamusume)
description:
LoRA of Oguri Cap (umamusume)

All of my works is free. If you'd like to support me, feel free to buy me a coffee. 👍

Recommend options

  • LoRA weight 0.5~0.9

  • Trigger words

    • base

      • oguri cap \(umamusume\)

    • Racing competition clothes :

      • navel, blue skirt, long sleeves, pleated skirt, sailor collar, red neckerchief, belt, black pantyhose, white jacket, white shirt, grey footwear, fur-trimmed boots

    • Casual clothes(maybe) :

      • white shirt, light brown cardigan, open clothes

    • Christmas costume :

      • christmas hair ornament, white gloves, white jacket, black pantyhose, white shirt, frills, white skirt, white vest, belt, grey legwear

  • Use animefull based model

  • Settings

    • DPM++ SDE Karras

    • 20 steps, CFG scale 4.5~6.5

    • kl-f8-anime2.vae

    • CLIP skip = 1

    • If using highres

      • Latent (bicubic antialiased)

      • Denoising strength 0.5~0.65

LoRA training info

  • based on Animefull-pruned

  • 160 images of oguri cap

    • 8x low quality 50 images

    • 16x medium quality 60 images

    • 32x high quality 50 images

    • => 1 epoch = 2960 images

  • replaced character feature tags with oguri cap \(umamusume\)

    • horse girl, horse tail, grey hair, blue eyes, etc.

  • using aspect ratio bucketing

  • resolution : 768x768

  • rank=alpha=16

  • using dadaptation

  • batch size = 4, 7 epochs trained

  • clip skip = 1

This LoRA may be compatible with animefull-based models (ex. AbyssOrangeMix Series...)

All uploaded images are output of AbyssOrangeMix2-nsfw, kl-f8-anime2.vae
